comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called CCC Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 27320755@N04
comment._content:
Hi
I came to Oregon 1980. I haven't moved yet. I decided this is my country. I paint the vintage fashion created as it was liked to live here years ago. Thank you to pay the respect for the history of our state.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: tokiko13-- Thanks for your comments-- we live in a wonderful place! If you enjoy these CCC photos, I think you'll enjoy the next set we release with images of Celilo Falls from the Gerald W. Williams Collection.
